comments:
build: epf-composer-1.2.0-M2-win32

There is no exact steps for this issue yet but the following sequences seem always to generate errors
1. browse a cp, drill down to activities and TDs (i.e. in 711 lib). Make sure diagrams are enabled in preferences
2. switch to another lib (i.e. Openup)
results=> errors in log

!ENTRY org.eclipse.epf.common 4 0 2007-05-03 14:09:00.959
!MESSAGE Cannot modify resource set without a write transaction
!STACK 0
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot modify resource set without a write transaction

The cause: diagrams are not unloaded when library is closed.
